post:
Infinite Technologies is a leader in providing businesses with managed dedicated servers and managed VPS.

Enterprise-class IT infrastructure combined with comprehensive managed hosting services. As your IT hosting partner, Infinite Technologies leverages best-in-class connectivity & technology through fully automated solutions that empower you with complete access, control, security, and scalability.

All your servers are hosted in the state-of-the-art data facility in Amsterdam, the Netherlands. The data-center has N+1 redundant cooling, UPS, standby generator power and network connections. Your business uptime and performance are our focus!

Your VPS includes the following value added services:
• Fully managed technical support service*
• Control panel for VPS administration (reboot, reinstall, etc)
• Reverse DNS entries for allocated IPs
• IRC, game-servers, streams, web proxy, vpn (tun / tap) and legal adult content allowed
• No long-term contract requirement (month to month). Quarterly, semi-annual and annually available.


================I-N-S-T-A-N-T====S-E-T-U-P================
VPS on XenServer Virtualization Platform

​
VPS Starter [ORDER] - €10 per month!
• 1 Xeon Core, 2.0 GHz/core | 20 GB Space | 200 GB Data-Transfer | 512 MB RAM

VPS Plan 1 [ORDER] - €20 per month!
• 2 Xeon Core, 2.0 GHz/core | 50 GB Space | 600 GB Data-Transfer | 1024 MB RAM

VPS Plan 2 [ORDER] - €35 per month!
• 2 Xeon Core,, 2.0 GHz/core | 75 GB Space | 800 GB Data-Transfer | 1536 MB RAM

VPS Plan 3 [ORDER] - €50 per month!
• 4 Xeon Core, 2.0 GHz/core | 100 GB Space | 1000 GB Data-Transfer | 2048 MB RAM (2 GB!)

===============O-R-D-E-R====N-O-W===============

Operating systems:
• CentOS Enterprise LinuX
• Fedora Desktop Linux
• Ubuntu ServeR
• Debian Linux
• Gentoo Linux
• Slackware Linux
• FreeBSD 8 Unix (available on plan 1, 2 or 3 only)
• Windows 2003/2008 - additional (available on plan 1, 2 or 3 only)

Remote backups:
• 10 GB FTP/SCP Space : €5.00 EUR
• 20 GB FTP/SCP Space : €10.00 EUR
• 50 GB FTP/SCP Space : €25.00 EUR
• 100 GB FTP/SCP Space: €45.00 EUR

Control panels:
• cPanel/WHM : €12.00 EUR
• ISPmanager Pro: €4.00 EUR
• ISPmanager Lite: €2.00 EUR (free on plan 1, 2 or 3)

IP addresses:
• Additional IPs at 1 euro/IP per month
RIPE NCC assignment policies apply for all requests. Further information, www.ripe.net


For fine-print and further details, please visit: http://www.infinitetech.eu/ServerVirtualization/VirtualServers/

If you any questions, please email sales@infinitetech.eu

Infinite Technologies offers managed virtual servers, managed dedicated servers and managed web hosting solutions.
